zone.line: also
Their poetry seems to maintain a very
high though not so disproportionate a
rank in the comparison. Perhaps
Shakespeare from the variety & comprehension
-hension of his genius is to be considered
on as
as the greatest in as a whole, to be as
the greatest individual mind of which
specimens remaining.
we have ? ? Perhaps Dante
created imaginations of greater loveliness
& energy than any that are to be found
in the antient literature of Greece. Perhaps
has been discovered
nothing is to be found in the lyrical
fragments of of the Greek lyric Poets
equivalent to the sublime & chivalric
sensibility of Petrarch. — But as a
mere poet Homer must be acknowledged
to excel Shakespeare in the truth,
the harmony, the sustained grandeur
the satisfying completeness of his images,
their exact fitness to the illustration
and that
to which they belong: as muc and
